column6:
"CHILDHOOD'S END!" ,2006,2
Reverend Stryker brings his Ministry to the New X-Men. Will any of them survive the baptism?
The way things are going for X-23, she may not survive even that long. Part 4 (of 4)!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | inker:Jaime Mendoza | colorist:Brian Reber | letterer:Dave Sharpe
